price: Mwenyezi Mungu! Hapana mungu isipo kuwa Yeye. Yeye ana majina mazuri kabisa.
arabic: ٱللَّهُ لَآ إِلَٰهَ إِلَّا هُوَۖ لَهُ ٱلۡأَسۡمَآءُ ٱلۡحُسۡنَىٰ

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: al-lahu lā ilāha illā huwa lahu al-asmāu al-ḥus'nā
